scripts.build: npm run build:rm && npm run build:mkdir && npm run build:cp && npm run build:js
scripts.build:cp: cp src/chrome/manifest.json dist/chrome/manifest.json && cp src/chrome/images/* dist/chrome/images
scripts.build:js: npm run build:js:amazon && npm run build:js:background && npm run build:js:booklog && npm run build:js:bookmeter
scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:fixpack
scripts.pack: npm run build && npm run pack:firefox && npm run pack:chrome
scripts.pack:chrome: cd dist/chrome && sed -i '' -e '10,15d' manifest.json && zip -r ../amakankan-chrome.zip images js manifest.json
scripts.pack:firefox: cp -r dist/chrome dist/firefox && cd dist/firefox && zip -r ../amakankan-firefox.zip images js manifest.json
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run pack
scripts.watch: npm run build && npm run watch:cp & npm run watch:amazon & npm run watch:background & npm run watch:booklog & npm run watch:bookmeter
